title: Clubs want to see the date and user that saved a preliminary contract
custom_preconds: GIVEN that a club has created and saved a preliminary contract
custom_steps: WHEN a user opens that contract
custom_expected:
THEN they can see the user that created the contract under "Status Changed By"
AND the creation date under "Status Last Changed"

title: Clubs want to assign players to a minor league club in the contract
custom_preconds: GIVEN that club user is viewing the Addendum A section of a minor contract
custom_steps:
WHEN User expands addendum A section
AND Clicks save
custom_expected:
THEN the Org field is locked
AND the Club field is blank by default
AND the Club field is disabled if Org is not selected
AND the Club field updates to show only clubs for selected ORG
AND the current Under Control and Active Roster counts reflect those values as per the roster widget
AND the current Under Control and Active limits are displayed in parentheses next to those values
AND Signed For Next Year displays the number of players signed for next year in real time
AND All fields are saved.

title: Clubs want to populate how long the contract is for and when it was signed
custom_preconds: GIVEN that user is viewing the Addendum A section of a new contract
custom_steps:
1. WHEN today's date is on or between Jan 1st to "Begin to create MN contracts for following year" date
2. WHEN today's date is on or after "Default to following year for new MN contracts" date and before Jan 1st. of next year | T
custom_expected:
1. THEN show current year and next year in drop-down AND default to current year

2. THEN show current year and next year in drop-down. Default to next year 

AND Date Signed By Player is locked if the contract is e-signed

title: Clubs want to add salary information (Addendum Cs) to contract
custom_preconds: GIVEN that user is viewing the Addendum section of a minor contract
custom_steps: WHEN User expands addendum C section
custom_expected:
THEN this section is collapsed by default
AND the salary table functions the same as on [a single C form](http://10.4.36.21/testrail/index.php?/suites/view/1478&group_by=cases:section_id&group_id=12959&group_order=asc)
AND the Minor League Club field is not editable and is populated with the club that was chosen in the [Addendum A](http://10.4.36.21/testrail/index.php?/cases/view/81036)
AND the additional text field has a 250 character limit

title: Clubs want to pre-populate location signed information
custom_preconds: GIVEN that user is viewing the Execution of Contract section of a minor contract
custom_steps:
WHEN user selects USA for the Country Signed field
WHEN user selects any country other than USA
custom_expected:
1. THEN user sees the State Signed field

2. THEN user does not see the State Signed field

title: Clubs want to see a list of Addendum B clauses that they can use on non-1st year contract
custom_preconds: GIVEN that user is viewing the Addendum B section of a minor contract
custom_expected:
THEN the Addendum B section is collapsed by default
AND all sections appear as in [wireframe](http://f2j41d.axshare.com/#p=addendum_b_1)
AND the Add B sections works exactly like the Covenants section of Major Contracts.  Users can add and remove clauses using the trashcan / Add Term button
AND Toggling yes should auto-expand the clause. Clause cannot be expanded until toggled yes.
AND Clauses that are toggled to NO are grayed out and cannot be expanded
AND Toggling a clause to NO should collapse the clause and gray it out again.
AND If clause is added back in, it should be auto-toggled to Yes and expanded
AND Once the contract is saved and you toggle to view mode, the trash cans and toggles disappear. Clauses not included are grayed out in preliminary stat

title: Clubs want to pre-populate the negotiators and signatories
custom_preconds: GIVEN that user is viewing the Execution of Contraction section of a minor contract
custom_expected:
THEN the user can select any name that has Negotiator checked off in the signatory widget for Primary and Secondary Negotiator fields
AND the user can select any name that has the Mn UPC column checked off in the signatory widget for the Authorized Signatory field

title: Clubs want to add an Opening day Roster Bonus clause
custom_preconds: GIVEN that user is viewing the Addendum B section of a new non-first year minor contract
custom_expected:
THEN there is a Language dropdown column that is required
AND a Level of Play dropdown that is required
AND lists the levels of play available for that Org
AND a Club field that auto-populates with the club name once the user selects a level of play
AND if there are mutliple clubs at each LOP they are shown as a comma-seperated list
AND there is a Bonus Amount field that is required and auto-inserts commas in view mode

title: Clubs want to view the available languages that they can use on the contract through the language viewer
custom_preconds: GIVEN that user is viewing a new non-first year minor contract
custom_steps: 1. WHEN user clicks view
custom_expected:
THEN user can see a Language dropdown on contract clauses
AND the user can select between available BOC languages followed by available club standard languages
AND custom language can be saved


1. THEN The Clause is pre-selected to the clause from where you clicked "View" on the contract
AND The Org and Label is defaulted to what the user chose in the contract
AND Club can navigate between other Orgs/BOC in the dropdown
AND When an Org/BOC is selected, the Label dropdown refreshes to show Labels for that Clause + Org. Default to the first option
AND When Label is selected, the effective date dropdown refreshes. Default to the most current

title: Clubs want to add a a Minor League Drug Test clause
custom_preconds: GIVEN that user is viewing the Addendum B section of a non-first year minor league contract
custom_expected:
THEN the user can add a Minor League Drug Test clause to the contract
AND this clause only has a language section field
AND this clause only appears if the player's Rule 4 draft status is "Not Subject"

title: Clubs want to add a Remain on Roster Bonus clause
custom_preconds: GIVEN that a user is viewing the Addendum B section of a new non-first year minor contract
custom_steps: WHEN the user adds a Remain on Roster Bonus clause
custom_expected:
THEN there will be a Language dropdown that is required
AND a Level of Play dropdown that is required
AND it lists all Levels of play for that Org
AND it is blank by default
AND there is a Club column that auto-populates with the club name once user selects a level of play
AND if multiple clubs exist at that level of play show a comma separated list
AND there is a Number of Consecutive Days column that is required
AND the rows are re-ordered on save based on this column from smallest to largest
AND there is an Amount column that is required
AND commas are auto-inserted in this column when in view mode

title: Clubs want to add a Foreign Team Inquiry clause
custom_preconds: GIVEN that a user is viewing the addendum b section of a new non-first year minor league contract
custom_steps:
1. WHEN the user adds a Foreign Team Inquiry clause

2. a. WHEN the user selects the Country dropdown
    b. AND the user selects more than one country

3. WHEN the user selects "Between" for the Inquiry Date dropdown

4. WHEN user selects "Before" or "After" for the Inquiry Date dropdown

5. WHEN user adds multiple rows with different Inquiry Dates
    AND one or more has a date range
    AND the user saves

6. WHEN user selects "Between" for the Acquisition Amount dropdown

7. WHEN user selects "No less than" or "No More than" for the Acquisition Amount clause

8. WHEN user enters amounts with 4 or more digits into the Acquisition Amount field
    AND clicks save
custom_expected:
1. THEN the Country multi-select dropdown is blank by default
AND Inquiry Date date dropdown is blank by default
AND Acquisition Amount dropdown is blank by default
AND ML Club Decision Deadline dropdown is blank by default
AND Roster Type Requirement is set to "40-Man Roster" by default
AND all of these are required fields

2. a. THEN the options are Japan, South Korea and Taiwan
    b. THEN the contract will print a separate row for each country (not testable during Sprint 8)

3. THEN a date range is shown

4. THEN just one date field is shown

5. THEN the rows are reordered by this column
    AND where date range is used, the first date is referenced

6. THEN show two number fields

7. THEN show just one number field

8. THEN commas are auto-added in view mode

title: Clubs want to enter a Minor League Miscellaneous clause
custom_preconds: GIVEN that club is viewing the addendum b section of a new non-first year minor league contract
custom_steps: WHEN club selects "Yes" on this section
custom_expected: THEN there is a language field and all global ac should be followed

title: Clubs want to enter a Minor League Assignment Salary clause

custom_steps:

AND clicks view
custom_expected:

AND language editor opens
AND language reader defaults to selected language
AND required fields marked with asterisk
AND Collapsible headers, toggles and trashcans should continue to work
AND Table form add row, delete row functionality should work. At least 1 row is required so the first row cannot be deleted
AND Auto- add commas into large numbers in view mode

title: Clubs want to add a Release clause with BOC language
custom_preconds: GIVEN that club is viewing the addendum b section of a new non-first year minor league contract
custom_steps:
WHEN user selects "Yes" for the Release clause
AND selects BOC language in the Language dropdown

1. AND creates multiple rows with different Player's Release Request Dates filled in
    AND clicks Save
custom_expected:
THEN user sees a Roster Type Requirement dropdown that is required and blank by default
AND a Roster Type Requirement Date (On or Before) date picker that is required and blank by default
AND a Player's Release Request Date date picker that is blank by default
AND a ML Club Decision Deadline dropdown that is required and blank by default

1. THEN the rows are re-orded with the oldest date on top

title: Clubs want to add a Release clause with club language
custom_preconds: http://10.4.36.21/testrail/index.php?/cases/view/81052
custom_steps: WHEN user selects club or custom language
custom_expected:
THEN user sees a Roster Type Requirement dropdown that is required and blank by default
AND a Roster Type Requirement Date (On or Before) date picker that is required and blank by default
AND a Player's Release Request Date date picker that is blank by default
AND a ML Club Decision Deadline dropdown that is required and blank by default

title: Clubs want to add a Signing Bonus clause to my contract
custom_preconds:
GIVEN that user is a club
AND is viewing the Addendum B section of non-first year contract
custom_expected:
THEN user sees a table with at least one row 
AND there is a Payment Amount column that is required
AND a Payment Date column with a date picker
AND a user cannot enter a date that is more than 1 year into the past
AND this field is required if Within Number of Days of Approval is not filled in
AND a Within Number of Days of Approval column
AND this field is required if Payment Date is not filled in

title: Clubs want to specify Signing Bonus payment
custom_preconds: http://10.4.36.21/testrail/index.php?/cases/view/81042
custom_steps:
1.WHEN user enters a value into the Payment Date column

2.WHEN user enters a value into the Within Number of Days of Approval column

3.WHEN user creates multiple rows with Within Number of Days and Payment Date filled in on various rows
AND saves the form of Approval rows will appear first ordered from least number of days to most
custom_expected:
1.THEN any value entered in to the Within Number of Days of Approval column will be cleared

2.THEN any value entered in the Payment Date column will be cleared

3.THEN rows will be reordered so Within Number of Days
AND Payment Date rows are reordered by date

title: Clubs want to calculate total signing bonus payments
custom_preconds:
GIVEN that user has created a signing bonus
AND one or more rows in the table with Payment Amounts added
custom_steps: WHEN user clicks the calculator button
custom_expected:
THEN Total Deferred is calculated as the sum of all values in the Payment Amount column
AND PV of Deferred is calculated as PV = payment amount / (1 + LRD Rate)^((Difference between payment date and signing date in days) / 362.25)
- LRD Rate = system value (if signing date is after tender date, use the following year's rate)
-  If Within Number Of Days of Approval field is filled in, Payment Date = Signing Date + Within Number of Days of Approval
- If signing date is null then use current date
AND Total Actual PV is the same as PV of deferred
AND the Total Actual is the same as Total Deferred

title: Clubs want to add custom language to a cluase
custom_preconds: GIVEN that user is viewing the language dropdown of the Signing Bonus clause
custom_steps: WHEN user selects 'Custom Language' from the dropdown
custom_expected:
THEN the user can select 'Custom Language'
AND it is the last option
AND the linked page appears as it does in the [wireframe](http://30ac5x.axshare.com/#p=select_clause_language)

title: Clubs want to know whether the Signing Bonus is eligible for recoupment
custom_preconds: GIVEN that a club is viewing the Signing Bonus question of a new non-first year minor contract
custom_steps:
WHEN the user fills in a signing bonus amount

1. AND the Total Actual is 250k or less

2. AND  250k < Total Actual < 1mil.

3. AND Total Actual > 1mil.
custom_expected:
1. THEN a message appears with the text "Elligible for 3 year Recoupment"

2. THEN a message appears with the text "Elligible for 4 year Recoupment"

3. THEN a message appears with the text "Elligible for 5 year Recoupment"

title: Clubs want to add a Signing Bonus with a Visa Contingency clause
custom_preconds:
GIVEN that a player's rule 4 draft status = not subject
AND the user has not chosen "yes" for a regular Signing Bonus clause
custom_steps: WHEN user views addendum B clauses
custom_expected:
THEN there will be an available Signing Bonus with Visa Contingency clause
AND it will behave the same way as a regular [Signing Bonus clause](http://10.4.36.21/testrail/index.php?/cases/view/83644&group_by=cases:section_id&group_order=asc&group_id=13836)
AND it will have a "Visa Contingency?" checkbox that is checked by default

title: Clubs want Signing Bonus with Visa Contingency hidden if the player is not subject to the rule 4 draft
custom_preconds: GIVEN a player's rule 4 draft = anything but 'not subject'
custom_steps: WHEN user look behind 'add terms'
custom_expected: THEN clause is hidden there

title: Clubs want either a Signing Bonus clause or a Signing Bonus with Visa Contingency to exclude the other
custom_preconds: GIVEN that the user is viewing the addendum b section of a new non-first year minor contract
custom_steps:
1. WHEN the user selects "yes" for a Signing Bonus clause
AND selects "yes" for a Signing Bonus with Visa Contingency clause

2. WHEN the user selects "yes" for a Signing Bonus with Visa Contingency clause
AND selects "yes" for a Signing Bonus clause
custom_expected:
1. THEN the Signing Bonus clause auto-toggles to no

2. THEN the Signing Bonus with Visa Contingency clause auto-toggles to no

title: Clubs want redundant clauses to close others
custom_preconds: GIVEN that club is viewing the addendum b section of a new non-first year minor league contract
custom_steps:
1. WHEN user toggles on the Offset Salary Earned clause
 a. AND user toggles on the Fixed Lump Sum clause
 b. AND toggles on the Unearned Salary clause

2. WHEN user toggles on the Fixed Lump Sum clause
 a. AND toggles on the Unearned Salary clause
custom_expected: THEN the previously toggled-on clause will be toggled off

title: Users want "Close" on a Contract to return them to starting point
custom_steps:
1. WHEN the user creates a new contract from contract history
AND puts the form is in view mode
AND user clicks Close

2. WHEN the user creates a new contract from contract history
AND immediately clicks Cancel
custom_expected:
1. THEN the form will close and the user will be taken back to the contract history tab

2. THEN the form will close and the user will be taken back to the contract history tab

title: Users want "Close" on Addendum Cs to return to starting point
custom_steps:
1. WHEN the user creates a new Add C from contract history
AND puts the form is in view mode
AND user clicks Close

2. WHEN the user creates a new Add C from contract history
AND immediately clicks Cancel
custom_expected:
1. THEN the form will close and the user will be taken back to the contract history tab

2. THEN the form will close and the user will be taken back to the contract history tab

title: Clubs want to see Addendum C attachments from Ebis 1
custom_preconds: GIVEN that user has located a player in Ebis 1 with completed Add Cs (with attachments) in his contract history
custom_steps:
WHEN user logs into Ebis 2.5
AND locates the above player's contract history
custom_expected:
THEN the user can open one of the same Add Cs that are present in Ebis 1
AND can see the same file(s) attached that were attached in Ebis 1
